data.title: Dance With The Devil: The Cozy Powell Story
data.meta_description: One of my big influences and one of my all time favorite drummers.    COZY POWELL,,,

i wore out the 2 albums with jeff beck.

His solo stuff was real good too!

Solo Albums:

Over the Top (1979)

Tilt (1981)

Octopuss (1983)

The Drums Are Back (1992)

Especially for You (1999)

Here's side 1 of "Over The Top"

Personnel

Cozy Powell – drums

Gary Moore – guitar

Clem Clempson – guitar

Bernie Marsden – guitar

Jack Bruce – bass guitar

Don Airey – keyboards

Max Middleton – keyboards

Cozy played on a LOT of albums & sessions!

Check out his discography here:

Location

I realize hundreds of rock drummers with dazzling fluidity, power & chops have come along since Cozy's heyday as a big name, but having experienced the fortunate luxury of sitting right behind his kit in San Francisco while he performed a concert with Rainbow, well. THAT left an unforgettable impression on 23 year old me. Wow.

He exuded an aura of coolness, control & finesse behind the drums that I've not seen before or since.
